member.summary: Gets the singleton instance for DisplayUnitFormats

member.name: M:ArcGIS.Desktop.Core.UnitFormats.DisplayUnitFormats.GetDefaultProjectUnitFormat(ArcGIS.Desktop.Core.UnitFormats.UnitFormatType)
member.summary: Gets the default unit format in the current project for the given . This method must be called on the MCT. Use QueuedTask.Run.
member.param: The default unit format to return
member.remarks: The default unit formats can vary between projects. If there is no project open the current application default format is returned for the given
member.exception: This method or property must be called within the lambda passed to QueuedTask.Run

member.name: M:ArcGIS.Desktop.Core.UnitFormats.DisplayUnitFormats.SetDefaultProjectUnitFormat(ArcGIS.Desktop.Core.UnitFormats.DisplayUnitFormat)
member.summary: Set the given project default unit format in the current project. This method must be called on the MCT. Use QueuedTask.Run.
member.param: The project default unit format to set
member.remarks:
If there is no current open project, attempting to set the default is ignored.
The specific default to set is determined by the of the input defaultFormat.
In other words, to set the default project angular unit format, pass in a DisplayUnitFormat from the predefined list of available angular unit formats; to set the default project area unit format, pass in a DisplayUnitFormat from the predefined list of available area unit formats; and so on.
If the provided defaultFormat is not currently in the list of project unit formats for the given DisplayUnitFormat.UnitFormatType then it will be added to the list
member.exception: This method or property must be called within the lambda passed to QueuedTask.Run
defaultFormat

member.name: M:ArcGIS.Desktop.Core.UnitFormats.DisplayUnitFormats.GetProjectUnitFormats(ArcGIS.Desktop.Core.UnitFormats.UnitFormatType)
member.summary: Get the current list of unit formats in the current project for the given . This method must be called on the MCT. Use QueuedTask.Run.
member.param: The type of unit format list to return
member.remarks: The list can vary between projects. If there is no project open the list returned is the current default application list (for the given unitFormat).
member.exception: This method or property must be called within the lambda passed to QueuedTask.Run

member.name: M:ArcGIS.Desktop.Core.UnitFormats.DisplayUnitFormats.SetProjectUnitFormats(System.Collections.Generic.IList{ArcGIS.Desktop.Core.UnitFormats.DisplayUnitFormat},ArcGIS.Desktop.Core.UnitFormats.DisplayUnitFormat)
member.summary: Sets the list of project unit formats for the current project for the given . This method must be called on the MCT. Use QueuedTask.Run.
member.param: The list of unit formats to be set for the project
(optional) specifies a new default
member.remarks:
If there is no current project then attempting to set the project unit formats will be ignored (to include the default if one was specified).
The projectUnits list must contain at least one entry
All units in the projectUnits list must be of the same or a will be thrown.
.If a default value is specified that is not in the list of projectUnits, it will be added to the list.
If no default value is specified then the current project default value is assumed and will be added to the list of projectUnits if it is not in the list.
The following lists of project units cannot be changed:
UnitFormatType.Page
UnitFormatType.Symbol2D
UnitFormatType.Symbol3D
Attempts to change available project units of these types will result in an .
member.exception: This method or property must be called within the lambda passed to QueuedTask.Run
projectUnits must have at least one entry
project unit not of type 'unitFormat'
default unit not of type 'unitFormat'
units cannot be changed

member.name: M:ArcGIS.Desktop.Core.UnitFormats.DisplayUnitFormats.GetPredefinedProjectUnitFormats(ArcGIS.Desktop.Core.UnitFormats.UnitFormatType)
member.summary: Gets the complete list of available unit formats in the current project for the given . This method must be called on the MCT. Use QueuedTask.Run.
member.param: The predefined unit format list to return
member.remarks:
The predefined list does not vary between projects.
If there is no project open the list of predefined units defined for the application is returned.
member.exception: This method or property must be called within the lambda passed to QueuedTask.Run

member.summary: Get the coordinate system filters (in the coordinateSystemFilterProperties instance passed as argument): - Extent (EnvelopeN) to filter all coordinate systems. - GCS WKID (int) to filter the projected coordinate systems by the geographic coordinate system they are based on. - Projection property type to filter the projected coordinate systems.

member.summary: Interaction logic for UnitValueInput.xaml
UnitValueInput

member.name: P:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.CommonControls.UnitValueInput.EnableSelectOnFocus
member.summary: Focus the text within the control when selected by mouse or keyboard.

member.name: P:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.CommonControls.UnitValueInput.SelectOnUnitChanged
member.summary: This flag indicated whether the conents of the control's text box should be selected when the units are changed. Default value = true. This was added to support editing of the unit control from within a datagrid, where keying in a number should be sufficient to start editing the cell, and the value typed should not be lost

member.name: F:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.CommonControls.UnitValueInput.ReplacementLinearNumericFormatProperty
member.summary: By default, the control will display linear values using the numeric format stored on the selected unit. If a Selected Linear Numeric Format is supplied, linear values will be displayed using this format. This can be used to prevent loss of precision when entering data.

member.name: P:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.CommonControls.UnitValueInput.NumberValue
member.summary: The value in InputPECode units.

member.name: P:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.CommonControls.UnitValueInput.UseModifierText
member.summary: Allow modifier text to be passed back to the callee.

member.name: P:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.CommonControls.UnitValueInput.ModifierText
member.summary: Any modifier text which has been added after the numerical value.

member.name: F:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.CommonControls.UnitValueInput.AcceptNullProperty
member.summary:
Allow null to be entered in the number field. AcceptNull is used in conjunction with the number value.
If AcceptNull is true: The default value will be null, The control can pass back a null value, An empty cell is a valid value, The property bound to NumberValue MUST be a nullable double.
If AcceptNull is false: The default value is 0.0, The control will never pass back a null value, An empty cell is not a valid value The property bound to NumberValue can be either double? or double.

member.name: F:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.CommonControls.UnitValueInput.WatermarkOnNullProperty
member.summary: If AcceptNull == true, optionally display a watermark in the textbox if the textbox is currently empty.

member.name: P:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.CommonControls.UnitValueInput.AllowMathExpression
member.summary:
Allow null to be entered in the number field. AcceptNull is used in conjunction with the number value.
If AllowMathExpression is true: Simple expressions (a single +, -, * or /) can be used to enter the number value. e.g. 39.0 / 3, 4 * 24.2, 85 - 4

member.name: P:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.CommonControls.UnitValueInput.InputPECode
member.summary: The unit PECode for the initial NumberValue set.

summary.para: The list of units available for a user to select.
If no units are loaded the list will initialize based on UsePageUnits or the InputPECode set.

member.name: P:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.CommonControls.UnitValueInput.IsSpinnerVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets Whether the spinner is visible

member.summary: Gets the command that can be used to decrement the value by a small amount.

member.name: P:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.CommonControls.UnitValueInput.SmallIncrementValueCommand
member.summary: Gets the command that can be used to increment the value by a small amount.

member.name: M:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.CommonControls.CoreUtil.BringExplorerWindowToFront(System.String)
member.summary: This method will look for an explorer window that has a selected file that matches the selectedFileFullPath param and then call SetForegroundWindow() on that explorer window. The method will return without bringing a window to the foreground if the ProjectClosingEvent or ApplicationClosingEvent is fired during execution.

member.name: T:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.CommonControls.ToolBarBehaviors
member.summary:
This class is not for public use and is used internally by the system to implement support for other ArcGIS Pro modules ToolBar help attached properties.
AutoHideOverflow - Shows and hides the overflow button, if the toolbar has overflow - items present. SyncOverflowBackground - Synchronizes the Background color of the overflow button with - the background color of the toolbar. If the template of the - ToolBar is overridden, this is not necessary. AutoHideLabels - Shows and hides labels on buttons when toolbar is resized - Button content should be an Image | Label

member.summary: True to stay backward compatible with previous version of HAP. This option does not guarantee 100% compatibility.

member.name: F:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.HtmlDocument.OptionAddDebuggingAttributes
member.summary: Adds Debugging attributes to node. Default is false.

member.name: F:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.HtmlDocument.OptionAutoCloseOnEnd
member.summary: Defines if closing for non closed nodes must be done at the end or directly in the document. Setting this to true can actually change how browsers render the page. Default is false.

member.name: F:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.HtmlDocument.OptionCheckSyntax
member.summary: Defines if non closed nodes will be checked at the end of parsing. Default is true.

member.name: F:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.HtmlDocument.OptionComputeChecksum
member.summary: Defines if a checksum must be computed for the document while parsing. Default is false.

member.name: F:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.HtmlDocument.OptionEmptyCollection
member.summary: Defines if SelectNodes method will return null or empty collection when no node matched the XPath expression. Setting this to true will return empty collection and false will return null. Default is false.

member.name: F:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.HtmlDocument.DisableServerSideCode
member.summary: True to disable, false to enable the server side code.

member.name: F:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.HtmlDocument.OptionDefaultStreamEncoding
member.summary: Defines the default stream encoding to use. Default is System.Text.Encoding.Default.

member.name: F:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.HtmlDocument.OptionExtractErrorSourceText
member.summary: Defines if source text must be extracted while parsing errors. If the document has a lot of errors, or cascading errors, parsing performance can be dramatically affected if set to true. Default is false.

member.name: F:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.HtmlDocument.OptionExtractErrorSourceTextMaxLength
member.summary: Defines the maximum length of source text or parse errors. Default is 100.

member.name: F:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.HtmlDocument.OptionFixNestedTags
member.summary: Defines if LI, TR, TH, TD tags must be partially fixed when nesting errors are detected. Default is false.

member.name: F:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.HtmlDocument.OptionOutputAsXml
member.summary: Defines if output must conform to XML, instead of HTML. Default is false.

member.name: F:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.HtmlDocument.OptionPreserveXmlNamespaces
member.summary: If used together with and enabled, Xml namespaces in element names are preserved. Default is false.

member.name: F:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.HtmlDocument.OptionOutputOptimizeAttributeValues
member.summary: Defines if attribute value output must be optimized (not bound with double quotes if it is possible). Default is false.

member.name: F:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.HtmlDocument.OptionOutputOriginalCase
member.summary: Defines if name must be output with it's original case. Useful for asp.net tags and attributes. Default is false.

member.name: F:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.HtmlDocument.OptionOutputUpperCase
member.summary: Defines if name must be output in uppercase. Default is false.

member.name: F:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.HtmlDocument.OptionReadEncoding
member.summary: Defines if declared encoding must be read from the document. Declared encoding is determined using the meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html;charset=XXXXX" html node. Default is true.

member.name: F:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.HtmlDocument.OptionStopperNodeName
member.summary: Defines the name of a node that will throw the StopperNodeException when found as an end node. Default is null.

member.name: F:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.HtmlDocument.OptionUseIdAttribute
member.summary: Defines if the 'id' attribute must be specifically used. Default is true.

member.name: F:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.HtmlDocument.OptionWriteEmptyNodes
member.summary: Defines if empty nodes must be written as closed during output. Default is false.

member.name: F:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.HtmlDocument.OptionMaxNestedChildNodes
member.summary: The max number of nested child nodes. Added to prevent stackoverflow problem when a page has tens of thousands of opening html tags with no closing tags

member.summary: Replace characters above 127 by entities.

member.name: T:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.LocalizedEnum`1
member.summary: Helper Class to populate localized strings to bind enum to usercontrol
member.typeparam: T represents the type of enum that we are trying to localize

member.name: M:ArcGIS.Desktop.Internal.Core.LocalizedEnum`1.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary:
This class expects the Resource variable for the enum created in the following format: "ENUM NAME" + "__" + "ENUM VALUE"
^ | Two Underscores Ex:
enum MyColors { Red, Green, Blue }
In the ResourceFile we expect the following variables to provide the localized strings as given below:
MyColors__Red MyColors__Blue MyColors__Green
Constructor accepts any type of any C# class with static properties defined in the above format.
member.param: Type of the resource contains the resource strings for the enum.
